name: Pizza Parkour (TransGame668)
description:
Screenshot will be available soon

A game where you jump from obstacle to obstacle, its a really challenge you in this game. I'm call this an "Pizza Parkour" because the platforms like cube and the cylinder have pictures of pizza in it. Only 8 Level in here. If you accidently fall they checkpoint it, so won't back to the beginning. Just avoid from the red blocks (in few level they spinning) in last level you will find the pizza box and finally you winning it.

Controls: WASD / Arrow Key for Movement, Shift is Run, and Space Bar to Jumping.
